 The equation for wind power(P) is given by P= 0.5 x ρ x A
x Cp x V3 x Ng x Nb where, ρ = Air density in kg/m3
, A =
Rotor swept area (m2
).
Cp = Coefficient of performance
V = wind velocity (m/s)
Ng = generator efficiency
Nb = gear box bearing efficiency.
